members.joinCircumstances: Joined after Luffy saved him from execution
Officially joined after the Arlong Park Arc
Joined after defending his village from Kuro

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Decide to Escape with Ryu
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat crew commits to helping Apis and Ryu escape from Warship Island, demonstrating their willingness to help those in need.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's compassionate nature and teamwork during a crisis situation.

keyMoments.title: The Escape Begins
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats begin their daring escape from Warship Island with Ryu, breaking through the Marine blockade.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's coordination and determination to complete their mission.

ships.description: The Straw Hats' first ship, used for their escape from Warship Island

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Marines Surround the Island
keyMoments.description: Marine ships under Nelson Royal's command surround Warship Island, attempting to trap the Straw Hats and prevent their escape with Ryu.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' tactical approach to capturing pirates and their involvement in the Warship Island conflict.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Provides Combat Cover
keyMoments.description: Marine soldiers attempt to interfere with the crew's escape preparations but are fought off by Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines as antagonistic force in this episode.

jollyRoger.description: The Marine symbol - a seagull with the word MARINE
